faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about pricing, credits, and plans
faq.contactSubtitle: Our sales team is here to help you choose the right plan and answer any questions.

items.question: What happens if I run out of credits?
items.answer: AI features will be temporarily paused until you upgrade your plan or purchase additional credits. Core PMS functions remain operational. You'll receive warnings at 80% and 95% usage.

items.question: Do unused credits roll over?
items.answer: No. Credits reset at the start of each billing cycle. This ensures predictable monthly costs and optimal performance.

items.question: Can I buy additional credits?
items.answer: Yes. Professional and Enterprise plans can purchase credit top-ups at $0.10 per credit. Contact sales for volume pricing.

items.question: How do I track my credit usage?
items.answer: Your dashboard shows real-time credit balance, daily usage breakdown (chat/voice/automation), and projected month-end usage. Transparent reporting included.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! All new hotels get a 14-day free trial with 500 bonus credits to test AI features. No credit card required to start.

items.question: What's included besides AI credits?
items.answer: All plans include: PMS core features, guest management, reservation system, staff dashboard, basic analytics, and standard integrations. AI credits only power optional AI features.

items.question: Can I change plans mid-month?
items.answer: Yes. Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing. Downgrades apply at the next billing cycle to protect your current credit balance.

items.question: Do you offer discounts for hotel groups?
items.answer: Yes. Enterprise plans include volume discounts for multi-property groups. Contact sales for custom pricing.
